price: 72. Jie tarė: „Mes praradome karaliaus (auksinį) dubenį ir tam, kuris suras tai yra (atlygiu) kupranugario krovinys. Ir aš būsiu tuo įpareigotas.“
arabic: قَالُواْ نَفۡقِدُ صُوَاعَ ٱلۡمَلِكِ وَلِمَن جَآءَ بِهِۦ حِمۡلُ بَعِيرٖ وَأَنَا۠ بِهِۦ زَعِيمٞ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū nafqidu ṣuwāʿa al-maliki waliman jāa bihi ḥim'lu baʿīrin wa-anā bihi zaʿīmun
